SEARCH
Package userInterface

Class AdminApptUI

java.lang.Object
userInterface.AdminApptUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
AdminApptInterface
public class AdminApptUI extends Object implements AdminApptInterface
The class implements AdminApptInterface to provide a UI for administering appointment-related tasks for admins. This class provides functionality to filter and view appointments and outcomes by doctor, patient, or all appointments. It also allows admin to view appointment outcomes such as medical records for patients.

  • Method Details

    • filterAppointments

      public void filterAppointments(Scanner sc)
      Displays the main menu to filter appointments and handles user input. Allows the admin to view appointments by various criteria such as all, by doctor ID, or by patient ID.
      Specified by:
      filterAppointments in interface AdminApptInterface
      Parameters:
      sc - A Scanner object to read user input.

    • viewAllAppointments

      public void viewAllAppointments()
      Displays all existing appointments. Calls the AppointmentManager to display all the appointments.

    • selectDoctorHelper

      Returns:
      Doctor object if found, otherwise null.

    • viewAllApptOutcomes
